DOC.brief_summary: Comparison between the efficacy of two different antibiotics in patients with overt hepatic encephalopathy. The study is randomized, controlled and double-blinded.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Erythromycin and Neomycin Treatment of Hepatic Encephalopathy
